text: mine-llezine hadu yuharrifune-lkelime `am mevadi`ihi veyekulune semi`na ve`asayna vesma` gayra musme`iv vera`ina leyyem bielsinetihim veta`nen fi-ddin. velev ennehum kalu semi`na veeta`na vesma` venzurna lekane hayral lehum veakveme velakil le`anehumu-llahu bikufrihim fela yu'minune illa kalila
